original_text: But when this son of yours who has squandered your property with prostitutes comes home, you kill the fattened calf for him!’
korean_text: 아버지의 살림을 창녀들과 함께 삼켜 버린 이 아들이 돌아오매 이를 위하여 살진 송아지를 잡으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: But when this son of yours
who has squandered your property with prostitutes
you kill the fattened calf for him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그를 위해 살찬 송아지를 잡습니다

sentences.original_text: But when this son of yours comes home
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신의 이 아들이 집에 돌아오면

sentences.original_text: who has squandered your property with prostitutes
